sl.sli: SynchronizeTwoStreams: This sample application for the Synchronize operator reads a pair of streams from files.

section.p: This sample application for the Synchronize operator reads a pair of streams from files. Each file contains synthentic timestamps and text labels, with even- and odd-numbered values in different files.
The Synchronize operator synchronizes the streams according to the timestamps and merges them into a single output file.
